00024 #ifndef NATIVESERIALENGINE_H
00025 #define NATIVESERIALENGINE_H
00026 
00027 #include <QtCore/QStringList>
00028 
00029 #include "abstractserialengine.h"
00030 
00031 class NativeSerialEnginePrivate;
00032 class NativeSerialEngine : public AbstractSerialEngine
00033 {
00034     Q_OBJECT
00035 public:
00036     explicit NativeSerialEngine(QObject *parent = 0);
00037     virtual ~NativeSerialEngine();
00038 
00039     bool isValid() const;
00040 
00041     //my impl (device parameters and controls)
00042     bool setBaudRate(AbstractSerial::BaudRate baudRate);
00043     bool setDataBits(AbstractSerial::DataBits dataBits);
00044     bool setParity(AbstractSerial::Parity parity);
00045     bool setStopBits(AbstractSerial::StopBits stopBits);
00046     bool setFlowControl(AbstractSerial::Flow flow);
00047     bool setCharIntervalTimeout(int msecs);
00048 
00049     bool open(QIODevice::OpenMode mode);
00050     void close();
00051     bool flush();
00052     bool reset();
00053 
00054     bool setDtr(bool set);
00055     bool setRts(bool set);
00056 
00057     ulong lineStatus();
00058 
00059     qint64 bytesAvailable(bool wait);
00060 
00061     qint64 read(char *data, qint64 maxSize);
00062     qint64 write(const char *data, qint64 maxSize);
00063 
00064     bool waitForRead(int msecs = 3000, bool *timedOut = 0) const;
00065     bool waitForWrite(int msecs = 3000, bool *timedOut = 0) const;
00066     bool waitForReadOrWrite(bool *readyToRead, bool *readyToWrite,
00067                             bool checkRead, bool checkWrite,
00068                             int msecs = 3000, bool *timedOut = 0) const;
00069 
00070     bool isReadNotificationEnabled() const;
00071     void setReadNotificationEnabled(bool enable);
00072 
00073 protected:
00074     //add 05.11.2009
00075     enum ioQueue{ txQueue, rxQueue };
00076     qint64 currentTxQueue() const;
00077     qint64 currentRxQueue() const;
00078 
00079 private:
00080     Q_DECLARE_PRIVATE(NativeSerialEngine)
00081     Q_DISABLE_COPY(NativeSerialEngine)
00082 };
